Package oop.ex6.verifier

Class SemanticsVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • oop.ex6.verifier.SemanticsVerifier
  • public class SemanticsVerifier
extends java.lang.Object
    A verifier class for static semantics of the code: checks valid assignments and referring for variables

    • Method Detail

      • setupGlobalScope

        public void setupGlobalScope()
                      throws VerifierExceptions
        Building the global scope tables: (1) methods table: contains every method details: name and parameters. (2) global variables table: contains all of global variables details: constant, type, name, and value. Then it puts global variables table as the root of the LinkedList of the scopes tables. global -> local_1 -> local_2 -> ... -> local_n
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal variable or method

      • checkMethodSignature

        public void checkMethodSignature​(java.lang.String line,
                                 int lineNum)
                          throws VerifierExceptions
        check the validity of method signature, and increment the block counter.
        Parameters:
        line - line to check
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal method signature

      • verifyLocalScopes

        public void verifyLocalScopes()
                       throws VerifierExceptions
        verify all of the local scopes (all methods and if\while blocks in the code)
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal line

      • verifyIfWhile

        public Block verifyIfWhile​(java.lang.String line)
                    throws VerifierExceptions
        check if\while line = if\while (conditions*)
        Parameters:
        line - code line
        Returns:
        if\while verified block
        Throws:
        VerifierExceptions - illegal if\while line
